00149 Result LoadFFmpeg()
00150 {
00151         Result rlt;
00152 
00153         UnloadFFmpeg();
00154 
00155         // Load FFmpeg
00156         if(!(isffmpeg_lib = LoadLibrary("ISFFmpeg.dll")))
00157                 return ERR("ISFFmpeg.dll not found");
00158         if(!(isffmpeg_procs[0] = GetProcAddress(isffmpeg_lib, "CreateFFmpeg")))
00159                 return ERR("CreateFFmpeg not found in ISFFmpeg.dll");
00160         if(!(isffmpeg_procs[1] = GetProcAddress(isffmpeg_lib, "CheckFFmpegSupport")))
00161                 return ERR("CheckFFmpegSupport not found in ISFFmpeg.dll");
00162 
00163         // Init FFmpeg
00164         LPTSTR missingdllname;
00165         if(CheckFFmpegSupport(&missingdllname) == false)
00166                 return ERR(String("Library not found: ") << String(missingdllname));
00167         CHKALLOC(ffm = CreateFFmpeg());
00168 
00169         CHKRESULT(ffm->Init());
00170 
00171         // Init movie
00172         CHKRESULT(ffm->LoadFile("H:\\Movies\\Dumm Und Duemmer (1994 -German - 720p).mkv", &movie)); //"knife.mpg"
00173 
00174         PixelFormat pixfmt = PIX_FMT_BGR24;
00175         CHKRESULT(movie->PrepareVideoStreaming(0, NULL, &pixfmt, SWS_BICUBIC, &buffer));
00176         movie->SetVideoFrame(0, videoframe);
00177 
00178         CHKRESULT(ffm->PrepareBlittingToWnd(fms->GetHwnd(0), new Rect<int>(0, 0, movie->GetVideoWidth(0), movie->GetVideoHeight(0))));
00179         //CHKRESULT(ffm->PrepareBlittingToWnd(fms->GetHwnd(0), new Rect<int>(0, 0, 800, 600)));
00180 
00181         return R_OK;
00182 }
00183 void UnloadFFmpeg()
00184 {
00185         Result rlt;
00186 
00187         if(!isffmpeg_lib)
00188                 return;
00189 
00190         // Destroy movie
00191         if(movie)
00192         {
00193                 videoframe = movie->GetVideoFrame(0);
00194                 movie->EndVideoStreaming(0);
00195                 movie = NULL;
00196         }
00197 
00198         // Destroy FFmpeg
00199         if(ffm)
00200         {
00201                 ffm->EndBlittingToWnd();
00202                 RELEASE(ffm)
00203         }
00204 
00205         // Unload FFmpeg
00206         FreeLibrary(isffmpeg_lib);
00207 
00208         return;
00209 }
